api.title: Public API
api.subtitle: Build custom integrations, automate workflows, or pull your data into other tools. Simple, RESTful, and built by one person who actually uses it.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.desc: All API requests require authentication using a personal API key.
auth.how: How to get your API key
auth.step4: Copy and store it securely — it won’t be shown again

base.title: Base URL
base.note: All endpoints are versioned — use /v1 for now. v2 coming later in 2026.

limits.title: Rate Limits
limits.note: Rate limits are per API key. Burst allowed. Headers include remaining requests.

endpoints.title: Available Endpoints (v1)
endpoints.desc: This is the current public surface — more endpoints will be added over time.
endpoints.worklogs: List work logs (filter by date, employee, etc.)
